Reviews.Title: Works on my samsung chromebook
Reviews.Author: Mike
Reviews.Content: After reading other reviews for the product I had the following thoughts ahead of time: you can't snake it by itself into anything too far without another contraption to guide it, the video and lights are lower in quality, and it may or may not work without the driver cd on some people's computers.I just wanted to take a moment to share my experience with the above 3 comments and a summary of my feelings on the product.-First, the cable comes in the box twisted up tightly, so yes, the camera continually wants to curl back on itself as you are trying to push it into whatever you are trying to push it into (in my case a 2nd story air conditioning vent), so I'm definitely going to need a sturdier snake of sorts to guide the camera.-Second, after reading the reviews my expectations were set appropriately on the camera and lighting quality (think grainy, but useful and only focused within 6 inches (which is all you'd need snaking it through a tight space anyway, overall good for the money and use of the product, plus the ability to adjust brightness on the usb section is a nice feature).-Third, I have a Samsung Chromebook (the $250 one with 16gb ssd, model 303c?? not sure) and after plugging in the usb, the lights came on immediately, and after I figured out that I needed to open the "camera" application that came with the chromebook, it worked just fine without any need for a driver install (which is good because the chromebook can't do driver installs to my knowledge :P).-Overall summary, I am happy with my purchase. I feel that, for the money, this device does what I expected it to do and I will probably have a good number of uses for it in the future around the house (or around my friends homes as projects pop up in the future).I give it 4 stars because of the pricepoint and features.

Reviews.Title: Well worth the price
Reviews.Author: Mark Strickland "Techie Guy"
Reviews.Content: This little camera works great.It is not exactly as durable as a commercial version but it is probably only 10% of the price or less.Some reviews talked about a problem with the LED brightness but it worked fine on my MacBook Pro.  I suspect that to be a power issue with the USB connector on their computer.  There are some "two head" USB short extension cables that can let you plug into two USB jacks to get more power.  The camera and the LED's get all of their power from the USB socket on the computer.  I could vary the LED brightness to any level required.  The little control on the side of the plug (computer end) was a bit "light duty" feeling but it worked fine.The focal length of the lens is fairly close and things maybe 18 inches away or more begin to get a bit fuzzy but it will focus very close down to an inch or two.I used it to look in the wall during a remodel job of a bath where an old steel vent pipe had visible corrosion before we opened up the whole wall to look at the pipe.  As it turned out I could see more problems so we did the necessary "drywall surgery" to replace more of the steel vent pipe.I only used my MacBook and I recorded the inspection session with QuickTime but no drivers were required.  The CD was a small format disk (not full diameter) and probably would not work with a MacBook slot loading drive but I did not need it any way.  If you record the session you don't have to worry about pausing long enough to inspect as you go.  Just watch the screen and move around as needed then replay the video stopping where needed to inspect.  The cable is NOT stiff enough to inspect in a wall without something to guide the camera.  I used an electricians "fish tape" that is essentially a piece of thick spring wire rolled around a disk that allows controlled un-coiling and winding up.  I simply taped the camera to the end and pushed in to the wall.  I already had the "fish tape".  A dowel rod or even a straightened out coat hanger would probably work OK in most cases.  If you need more accurate control then search for "fish tape" on Amazon and you can find something for $10 that should work.Recommended.

Reviews.Title: Fineally, something that delivers
Reviews.Author: J. Shoffner
Reviews.Content: I've had for two days.  So far, it meets the ticket!Pros:  easy to set up, no problem with windows 7.  The LED's are perfect for dark spaces (I've had it in the walls and am building the nerve to stick it down the toilet!).  The picture is clear and overall use is easy.  You take still pictures or video.Cons:  The rheostat is a bit flimsy.  It doesn't "gradually" impact brightness.  Instead, it's bright or dim.  Not a real problem.Keep in mind that focus is fixed; you focus by adjusting the distance between the camera and target.

Reviews.Title: Definitely a keeper!
Reviews.Author: Turbo Mom
Reviews.Content: I just don't understand what are all the negative reviews for?  The camera came on time and the product is up to the spec.  It is indeed waterproof, we used it to check out our clogged pool lines and the lens did not become wet or foggy.  The lights are very bright, but we still had to wait for a dark to be able to see anything on the laptop screen.  However, it is not camera's fault, the screen is dim in the sunlight, and I can't even read documents on it, let alone view a video.  Thanks to this little camera we were able to find a kink in the pipe and save ourselves a ton of money on the plumber that didn't even want to come to inspect the pipes with his camera for a charge of $150.  My suggestion - before starting using it, please read the instructions, it helps sometimes :-)

Reviews.Title: great scope, however...
Reviews.Author: Adam Szablya
Reviews.Content: its a great scope I like that I can use it for various tasks such as checking out the inside of my walls without tearing apart the drywall.  but if you are thinking about getting it to check inside an engine like i did make sure you get a much smaller video head and get one that is mold able so you can bend the shape of the video cam head.it uses the stock drivers for a webcam on windows 7. however i used skype because it was easier to manipulate the video. comes with drivers and software as well.

Reviews.Title: Camera is OK
Reviews.Author: Harry Carter
Reviews.Content: Has long cord, will only focus a about 6 inchs from an object. Very hard to keep it oriented, likes to go up-side-down. Fair pictur quality. Good for the price.

Reviews.Title: Gremlins, Gizmo and WATER !!
Reviews.Author: Ken - in Miami
Reviews.Content: I read the Instructions for this gizmo,  I saw the movie "Gremlins" but didn't put two and two together.Imperative #2 for Gremlins is " Don't get any water on it ".In this case, not horror story, but not exactly happy ending either.  And it might just be me.You might have an entirely different Gizmo when you are searching the interior of your plumbing for the mysteriously disappeared Buzz Lightyear that unfortunately has not gone "to infinity ... and beyond".To the point:  I was able to snake the camera far enough into the drain line to see and remove a problematic obstruction and save a plumber's visit.  I also found that the device is NOT waterproof.  Moisture infiltrated where the cable enters the housing and fogged the lens and messed up the camera.If I had known, I would have applied silicone aquarium sealant-adhesive to that area and had a better outcome.Bottom line - one use, did the job, and now I know better.I sincerely hope that you can benefit from my story and  remember the movie "Gremlins" and obey at least # 2 of  "three rules must be obeyed"BTW - Buzz is back from his adventure and restored joy to toyland.

Reviews.Title: Did exactly what I needed it to do
Reviews.Author: Kristin L. Montgomery
Reviews.Content: I dropped my engagement ring on my kitchen floor, and after two days determined that I thought it MAY have bounced underneath our kitchen cabinet, because we had looked everywhere else.  But how to find it without tearing the cabinet apart?  This worked perfectly.  I used the mini-cd in my computer (worked fine, just like a regular one, only smaller) and loaded the software to use the software that came with it.  The software isn't exactly obvious, but with with a little poking around found the preview function, which allowed me to see what the camera saw. I didn't need to record, so preview was perfect.  The light adjustment is on the USB end, so once I got the camera settled behind the base of the cabinet, I adjusted the light and moved the camera around.  I found the ring (and the items I dropped behind the cabinet in my first search for the ring) fairly quickly.

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: Steve
Reviews.Content: For the price I was impressed. Software was easy to install and the images are very clear. This little camera is going to come in handy in the home and shop.

Reviews.Title: Works well on a Mac
Reviews.Author: James W. Elkins "BigJimGunbarrel"
Reviews.Content: This USB camera works well on a Mac with OS 10.7.5.  You can view the camera's video on Mac's own PhotoBooth and QuickTime Software. Just select the USB camera versus the built-in Apple iSight camera on MacBooks.  You can record a still picture using PhotoBooth.  You can record a video using QuickTime.  The camera outside diameter is large, 9/16".  Still, a great deal and a great addition for any shop.

Reviews.Title: Blurry
Reviews.Author: D. Lusk "D"
Reviews.Content: The light washes out the image and makes it almost impossible to make out anything.  Was looking for a leak source in my walls, and it was just impossible to see anything with the light on.

Reviews.Title: Meh...
Reviews.Author: Brad
Reviews.Content: It does what it says, but the cord is very flimsy unlike the better $250-$500 models, so you need to attach it to a fish tape if your sending it through pluming or a wall.The head is a bit larger then some better models as well.  It's about 5/8" across, so it's probably not going to fit down a sparkplug hole.It does what it says, but it could be a lot better. Considering it cost a small fraction compared to the competition, it works.

Reviews.Title: NOT WATERPROOF!!!
Reviews.Author: Daniel Cortez
Reviews.Content: I was able to use the camera 1 time before it filled with water and would no longer connect to my computer. Save your money

Reviews.Title: Two major flaws
Reviews.Author: Nikolaos Ipiotis
Reviews.Content: This camera has two major flaws:1. It is not waterproof, as advertised.  On the very first use, water came into the casing making the camera unusable.2. The cord is too soft and on the first 90 degrees turn on the pipe the camera is stuck.After reading other reviews, I noticed I was not the only one that experienced these problems and returned the camera.

Reviews.Title: Very cool!!!
Reviews.Author: woodworkingguy
Reviews.Content: I received it and plugged it in to my PC laptop... and it connected right away!  Actually, pretty amazing that it works so well and is very inexpensive.  I suppose I could have spent more money to get an HD image... but it's really cool!  I bought it for a specific "Task", but I'm going to have some fun with it too!

Reviews.Title: Worked great in the toilet
Reviews.Author: G. Taff
Reviews.Content: I purchased this to retrieve a toy that our toddler tossed in the toilet. Worked great! I was able to see the small remote control that had gotten flushed and stuck in the neck of the toilet and was able to grab it with a magnetic claw tool. I did cover the just under the "hood?" part and around the "neck / near bottom of plastic lens" with some electrical tape to make sure it was well sealed before dropping it into the water. It was much easier to use this than removing the toilet and re-setting a wax ring.

Reviews.Title: Decent device for the price
Reviews.Author: Craig "Craig"
Reviews.Content: While others may be reviewing this device with high levels of scrutiny, let's keep in mind that what you have here is in inexpensive webcam with built in lighting mounted on a waterproof cable. So it's going to have some short range focus issues and graininess in the image quality if you don't get within its prime focal range. That aside, it's reasonably decent for its intended purpose of looking into tight spaces where you can't get and doesn't need any software to interface with Windows 8 and other Operating systems with built-in webcam support.

Reviews.Title: perfect
Reviews.Author: CJ
Reviews.Content: This works great!  The image is clear and in color.  The LED light works great and helps a great deal.  It has been used for looking in an engine and in tight spots around the house.  I would recommend this product to anyone!

Reviews.Title: see what lerks in that drain
Reviews.Author: Joe
Reviews.Content: real good del. fast i think 4 days,loaded real easy the program on comp. threw usb...looks good running camera ok picture I think its better to add a little silicone where wire enters camera & I suggest using a fiberglass elec. wire puller hooked on to push threw drains or inside walls where you use it...u can buy them in 50' for about 10 bucks just tape it every so often ..I only gave it 4 stars until I test it in water ? hope I never need to ...so I will owe u 1 more star if its waterproof ..thanks for the good product...............

Reviews.Title: Good product
Reviews.Author: Patricia
Reviews.Content: This is actually a good camera with good adjustable lighting.  I needed it to look in air vents but it has proved handy in walls as well.  Only drawback is that it isn't very stiff.  It allowed me to find some dead mice in the walls without tearing the entire wall up.  It did have  hard time moving through insulation however.  Note:  if you buy, the area that you are viewing will look bigger than it actually is.

Reviews.Title: Low video and software quality .
Reviews.Author: C. J. Vazquez
Reviews.Content: The software and video quality of this product is way too low.  Especially in dimly lit areas the resolution is so low you can't really distinguish what you're seeing.  It can't really be used other than for the simplest tasks.

Reviews.Title: Not as expected.
Reviews.Author: JEK
Reviews.Content: Cable so soft, hard to push into anything far. Wish it is much more stiffer to deep go into the pipe.

Reviews.Title: Needs an electrical snake to view inside walls
Reviews.Author: skintigh
Reviews.Content: I bought this so I could figure out how to run wires through non insulated walls, but the cable is way too flexible for most applications like going uphill or even pushing it along a horizontal surface. I think if I taped it to an electrical snake or maybe tied a weight to it for going down a wall that might work better. The quality is not amazing, but it works and it's cheap.

Reviews.Title: Worked once, then stopped working
Reviews.Author: Jose Cruz
Reviews.Content: As it says above. The camera was working then stopped working. I tried it in multiple USB ports and another computer and it still did not work. I then notice the shotty build work at the USB connector end.

Reviews.Title: Lost a wire in a wall?
Reviews.Author: james
Reviews.Content: Use this to find it. When fishing CCTV wires we cannot locate them sometimes. This is great for shoving in small holes and finding where that wire has gone.

Reviews.Title: Great stuff for what you pay for
Reviews.Author: Yardenia M.
Reviews.Content: The product is great although it doesn't do the best if you have low light, still really happy with it.

Reviews.Title: It really works
Reviews.Author: T. Cloar "TTC Riverman"
Reviews.Content: This is sooo cool.  I've used it 5 or 6 times in just the past few weeks.  Now my house is full of holes, but it really works.

Reviews.Title: It works well
Reviews.Author: B. A. Brown
Reviews.Content: This item is great for the price. Good lighting, and good picture. Also, it worked with my Windows XP computer without need to install special software. The typical problems persist with this type of device, due to the fact that the cable can't be fully straightened, but that's to be expected.

Reviews.Title: How can you go wrong?
Reviews.Author: Walt Disney
Reviews.Content: Plugged it in, and it worked on my Win 7 system! It shipped fast and arrived 1 day before it said it would.

Reviews.Title: Worked for 20 minutes.
Reviews.Author: Charlie
Reviews.Content: Product was working when I received it. I used it once, for about 20 minutes. The second time I tried to use it, it was dead.

Reviews.Title: Technically, the description is correct.
Reviews.Author: JD "JD"
Reviews.Content: Technically, it does come with a CD.  However, it's a blank mini CD with a picture of an angry panda on it.  This does not really help me use the product.

Reviews.Title: Poor quality, poor resolution and angle of view and no auto focus.
Reviews.Author: MZN
Reviews.Content: The length of cable is more than enough, the quality of the item and the resolution is poor and the yellow brass camera compartment end is solid and too long (around 2 Inches) which makes it very hard to pass elbows in pipes or any narrow paths!.I'm very disappointed.

Reviews.Title: Great for the price
Reviews.Author: Brian L. Sorrells
Reviews.Content: This thing is great!  The LED's are really bright and being able to adjust the brightness really helps to.  The only thing that'd help is some sort of focusing feature but then again it's great for the price.  I'd throw away the software though and just use any of the PC/Mac built in viewers like photobooth.

Reviews.Title: 16 ft cam
Reviews.Author: Brad Vyhlidal
Reviews.Content: I used this camera for only a couple of days before it quit working. I guess it's a get what ya pay for kinda deal. I didn't bother to notify anyone only because I was afraid they may send me another one.

Reviews.Title: Dim bulb
Reviews.Author: K. Duke "familyman"
Reviews.Content: The four LED's are so dim it's hard to tell if they are even on -- looking directly at them! Completely useless! I had to strap another light source on to my snake to see anything behind the walls. The software should be downloadable now that many tablets and netbooks have no CD drive. The light level of the LED's needs to be addressed, and it would be great if the software could be used to adjust the brightness.Update 9/1/2013. Maybe the dim bulb is me ;-) I found the light level control finally after reading the directions. I upgraded my review to 3 stars. The reasons I do not give it a higher rating:1. The focal length is about a half inch. For my use I would have preferred 4-6 inches, or better yet autofocus from that half inch up to 6 inches. I'm looking between walls through a hole I cut in the drywall, and it is very difficult to figure out what is what when you can only see a half inch or so.2. My netbook does not have a CD drive, so I really had to jump through hoops, and create my own installation on a thumb drive on a 2nd computer (desktop). At the very least the manufacturer should provide a web link to download the software.3. This is less of an issue, but the connector wire is pretty limp, and I needed to tape the camera to a snake in order to gain some control over where the camera went. Maybe that is what is intended since otherwise you are limited to dangling the camera and not directing it in any way.

Reviews.Title: Fun for the whole family.. LoL
Reviews.Author: D. S. Mckay "Scott"
Reviews.Content: I'm really enjoying this camera.  It's a Kool Tool and and Kool Toy. Plugged it into Windows 7. Didn't have to install any drivers. Within the 1st minute I was shoving it in my mouth to look at my teeth/etc. Fun and handy.hooked it up to my Asus Windows 8 pro tablet (worked perfect)hooked it up to my Samsung S4 phone (worked perfect, needed to d/l software from play store)hooked it up to Microsoft Surface Pro (worked perfect)Totally love the adjustable LED lights.-Scott

Reviews.Title: this is a toy
Reviews.Author: Man Yuen Chin
Reviews.Content: I got this to look down my drain but the brass front end is too large to go through the trap. Also, the focus is fixed and very hard to get it to give a good picture. The USB cable is a regular cable and is not articulated so you can't aim the camera, you have to hold it with your hand. Kind of defeats the 3 m USB cable. It is just not a useful tool, don't expect it to do anything more than a toy for your kids to play with for 10 min. Luckily, did not cost that much.

Reviews.Title: waterproof camera excellent buy
Reviews.Author: vonnie11
Reviews.Content: I purchased this item for future use work on automobile the price was right and received purchase in a timely fashion priced this item in box stores really was very expensive.

Reviews.Title: Does not work with MAC
Reviews.Author: Guez
Reviews.Content: I was hoping to use this with an Apple computer. Two problems:a) Current Apple disc readers do not read mini-CDs. I had to take my MAC to the Apple store to have the mini-CD removed.b) I managed to read the mini-CD on a PC. (It works on it.) Then I copied the mini-CD to a regular CD on the PC. However, when tried to run the program on the MAC, it complained that it could not run it.So, this works with a PC but not with the MAC. For me it has not been useful.

Reviews.Title: No Software
Reviews.Author: Howard Wong
Reviews.Content: My laptop detected the camera, and install the driver without problem.  However, the CD that came with the camera was blank..  So I had to use skype to test the camera.  The product description said, "XP system can watch video directly without install software, Vista or Win 7 need install software which in the CD"  My laptop use vista, so I need to figure out where to get this software.

Reviews.Title: still looking for them.............
Reviews.Author: Rev. Christopher
Reviews.Content: I don't understand this. I ordered two of them on April 9 th. and it was stated on the 10 th. that it was sent and that the two cam's would be at my address between May 5 th. and May 21 st..... This is May 14 th. why am I asked to rate the plumber's cam's when I'm still looking for them.....Rev. Christopher.......... were are thay??????????? .....Update.  It is the 21 st. the postmen has not seen anything or the people wear I live....  Rev. Christopher.  5-21-2014...

Reviews.Title: Amazing
Reviews.Author: Thomas E. Dunn
Reviews.Content: Works well with windows 7 and laptop very good to have around the house just in case I need to look for something

Reviews.Title: excellent product for the money
Reviews.Author: ben byrd
Reviews.Content: .the only way that I have been able to get this endoscope to work properly is to leave the disk in place and click on Open File while the desk is in my laptop other than that the images are clear and they are sharp and I'm about to investigate how much can be done and  with sound part of The endoscope

Reviews.Title: Not Bad
Reviews.Author: apt34
Reviews.Content: Easy to install, Price is good, cannot complain much. Just hope resolution was more clear. I don't know if they are waterproof yet

Reviews.Title: Good value for the price
Reviews.Author: J Christopher "J Christopher"
Reviews.Content: I bought this device in order to look inside my walls to see what wiring there was there.  I did some research and found scopes costing $100 and up.  But the job did not warrant such a price.  I considered renting too.  This scope was the low cost alternative.  If you look at value for cost, it is probably 5 stars.  But the resolution is just so-so.  Maybe 2 stars.  My 4 stars rating was based on the fact that it accomplished what I wanted at the right price.  Would I have liked something better?  Yes, but not at $100 plus.

Reviews.Title: Works great, really cheap
Reviews.Author: JeffM
Reviews.Content: This did the trick!  I had a clogged tub drain, and was able to send this down the overflow and see what I was aiming for with a probe/coat hanger.  It wasn't too great underwater, though it is waterproof.  It just has a cable, so if you need to push it along, you will need to tape it to something more rigid.  As long as you have a PC laptop, this is a much cheaper solution than a video probe at ten times the cost.

Reviews.Title: nice gadget, might come handy some day
Reviews.Author: Fouad Tarazi
Reviews.Content: Decent picture for the price. the screen shots will be stored in the pictures folder, and will take a while to find! iit still did not save the day in plumbing yet, but the day may come (i have a pipe that keeps blocking, so next time i will use to see what is happening)

Reviews.Title: Ehhh it works
Reviews.Author: Mercedes
Reviews.Content: It's a camera that records video. It does not zoom (we did not expect it to) but is clear when nothing is touching it. It will get fuzzy if something touches it on the side of the camera or if it touches fluid, which can be difficult. Hard to tell what is up and down, so we had to mark a part of the camera so we could continually keep it in the correct position.

Reviews.Title: good picture
Reviews.Author: Douglas Johnson
Reviews.Content: the scope is not easy to keep picture horizontal at length.  good view and adjustable brightness.  would like to be able to adjust focal length.

Reviews.Title: Many applications
Reviews.Author: Vince Cimorelli
Reviews.Content: Working good, have used this endoscope bore scope inspection camera for intended use. Noticed that this tool can replace inspection mirrors for hard to see areas.

Reviews.Title: It's okay-ish, not really
Reviews.Author: Cy
Reviews.Content: The build quality is not that great.The worst part is the image sensor. It is not centered and the focus and quality make it nearly impossible to work with.I would not recommend this product to anybody.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for what I wanted it for.
Reviews.Author: DigiKiwam
Reviews.Content: Be warned though, what you find when snaking this through a pipe may put you off eating for awhile. The BEST way to use this, if there are no RA bends in the pipe, is to tape it to a Fish Tape. The cable itself won't go far down the pipe or vent unless it's a straight drop.  I don't recommend taping it to an auger though, unless you wanna wreck your camera right away. I hooked it up to my phone (make sure your phone is able to use USB drivers though) also to my tablet and laptop - all without a problem.Like the other reviews will tell you, the focus is in the distance from the camera to the object. Closer - better focus (too close and you get nothing though).

Reviews.Title: endoscope
Reviews.Author: iburk
Reviews.Content: work great for what my son wanted to use it for working and fishing so it was a great deal

Reviews.Title: Disapointed Purchase
Reviews.Author: A. J. Richter "Seeker's Quest"
Reviews.Content: After searching the Internet for this Borescope, I thought it would be worth a try & at the price, it sounded like a deal.However, Seeing & Getting are two different things.The supplied CD would not work in my 2 players, So I couldn't download the drives. NO Online help at all.I sent the unit back & had to wait weeks for a refund.However, I'll try again until I find one that works.

Reviews.Title: Out of focus.
Reviews.Author: BRUCE E OTTO
Reviews.Content: This produced an out of focus image at every distance I tried. The lens was clean but the images looked smudged. Unless I received a defective unit I would not recommend this item at any price.

Reviews.Title: While it worked it was okay
Reviews.Author: Keary D Wass
Reviews.Content: I was using this through concrete inspection holes, most had water flowing out of them. Video quality is too poor to be usable if water has any turbulence to it, flow must be laminar.  I am sure this applies to all waterproof cameras. In dry holes where large voids were present the camera was not able to produce enough light to illuminate the void long distances. In dark areas the subject matter being recorded needs to be within 12 inches for the camera to produce video of any value. Had camera work well with 1 hole which had laminar water flow and only a small void and then it broke before I moved it too a second similar hole. It was used a total of 4 occasions. Software seems functional enough and having the dimmer switch at the USB plug was nice to have.

Reviews.Title: One of those cool tools to have if you are a DIY person.
Reviews.Author: James Fritz
Reviews.Content: One of those cool tools to have if you are a DIY person.I used it mainly to find where the builder of home messed up the HVAC ductwork.You will need to attach it to a fish tape or tape measure to feed into those extended locations.Works well with my laptop.

Reviews.Title: 16ft USB Waterproof Endoscope Borescope Inspection Camera
Reviews.Author: James Yancey
Reviews.Content: Worked better than expected!  However, mini DVD was damaged.  Fortunately the camera worked on Windows XP without installing software.  Thanks.

Reviews.Title: Works great and useful
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: This endoscope works great, has awesome picture, and is really useful. Easy to use and I have a dedicated netbook to use with this.

Reviews.Title: Pretty good.
Reviews.Author: Phil Beazle "Jockey"
Reviews.Content: Not sure what's good or bad on one of these.  Wasn't too hard to set up, though, had to install the included software to work on Win7.  Not a big deal.  Video quality seems to re-focus per the environment...a good thing.  Does pretty good close-up, like within 3/4 inch of target.  A little weird since don't know which way is up.  I put a mark on camera end to tell, but you wouldn't know when fed into tight space.  Quality seems good.  Still, for price and ease of use,  I'm happy with it.

Reviews.Title: Camera
Reviews.Author: Jonathan ochoa
Reviews.Content: its not so bad it gets the job done. i need it to look at my classic car gas tank. Man is it rusty .using Windows 7 driver instal its self. software on the cd did not work but just download it online no big deal.Here the download if you come across it to:  [...]

Reviews.Title: Hard to focus
Reviews.Author: Vangirl
Reviews.Content: There is no focus, so you 'focus' by moving it close too and far away from things. I think it is only really good for pipes (which to be fair is what it is for) but we couldn't get it to do anything useful for looking in our ductwork.  It was too floppy for large ducts.We will try it in our plumbing at some point and I think it might be better there.

Reviews.Title: No Good
Reviews.Author: JAMES CLERC
Reviews.Content: First one I had to return, CD was blank so I was not able to use it on Window 7. Ordered 2nd one and had to return because wires to camera were loose.

Reviews.Title: auto-focus works pretty well
Reviews.Author: Josh
Reviews.Content: The auto-focus concerned me, especially when using this in water. Much to my surprise it works pretty well. I've used this device for several different applications now (tub, commode, running cables, etc..)

Reviews.Title: Good for the price
Reviews.Author: Doug H
Reviews.Content: Price is right for a camera that works. I wouldn't test the water-resistance of this without sealing the lens-end. Attached to a snake, this worked for finding blockage in dryer vent ducting. Instructions are minimal. I didn't use the included software. Hooked up to a netbook, this provided me a portable inspection setup.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for seeing what is behind something
Reviews.Author: Dr. Dave "Dr. Dave"
Reviews.Content: I use this device for plugging in components in a motherboard.  The SATA connectors on the motherboard are hard to see and difficult to plug the cable into.I have used the camera to look into duct work as well as in the dropped ceiling in order to see where to route my cable runs.

Reviews.Title: Buy something else.
Reviews.Author: J.WILLIAMS
Reviews.Content: You get what you pay for which in this case is not much.Poor Video quality,not user friendly,not easy to use with windows 7,better than nothing is about the only positive thing I can say.

Reviews.Title: works though not much for my purpose
Reviews.Author: njny
Reviews.Content: 2 major issues with me: 1) the apps on mini disc to view the video insists to have admin password which is very suspecious and risky to give 2) the camera has 6cm to infinity focus range so one of usage its descrption suggested ie. to view into the ear will not get any  clear picture/video

Reviews.Title: Excellent purchase for the price, works well
Reviews.Author: mark
Reviews.Content: Works exactly as advertised. Good image, not high def. No driver necessary with Windows 7 if you use the webcam feature of Windows Movie Maker, so I did not use the software that came with the unit. A dial on the USB connection at the computer adjusts the level of the LED lights. Note that this camera has a fixed focal length, focus is adjusted by changing the camera distance from the object being viewed. I did not test the water resistance of this item, but if I were to use this in a wet environment I would add some heat shrink tubing to seal.

Reviews.Title: Waterproof Borescope Inspection Camera
Reviews.Author: WT Exp "WTBill, PhoneGuy, BC"
Reviews.Content: One must practice using this device to get used to interpreting what exactly one is viewing.  ie; a 2" orange-coloured crayon-like item under the fridge looked more like a large carrot on the video screen.

Reviews.Title: Great value for the price
Reviews.Author: Joel B.
Reviews.Content: Can't beat this on price.  Resolution is not the greatest, but is sufficient for most applications, i.e. looking way deep into dark spaces for a small part you dropped.

Reviews.Title: ugh
Reviews.Author: Karsyn22
Reviews.Content: Item broke within 20 min.... The camera just disappeared or fell off inside the housing capsule and now i'm left with a cord that has gold colored piece of metal on the end.

Reviews.Title: Terrible image quality, little LED control
Reviews.Author: lcf_guy
Reviews.Content: First the good: installation (XP) is simple and the software worked well.  Unfortunately the image quality is so bad that it is useless.  The color saturation is terrible with the LED lighting, and images are grainy always.  The focus is OK at about 10 cm, but by about 20 cm things are too blurry.  The LED control is either nearly off or max on, though this could be just my unit.  I am returning this one and will try an HD one which shows clearer photos in the ad.

Reviews.Title: Good at twice the price
Reviews.Author: Mike N
Reviews.Content: While not professional quality, for 90% of the handymen and home owners this will be more than adequate. The light is fully adjustable from none to - quite bright. I found that in many cases attaching it to a wire or other flexible device make controlling and fishing the light into spaces more efficient.

Reviews.Title: good light
Reviews.Author: ernie
Reviews.Content: Good led lights  and they are adjustable for brightness. Small easy to carry along with a PC.Cd is required for anything above XP

Reviews.Title: ju nk
Reviews.Author: JN
Reviews.Content: does not work.  does not work in win 7 or win 8 software does not work  junk product  stay away

Reviews.Title: Didn't work on my Mac
Reviews.Author: George Heuston
Reviews.Content: I have an old IBM Thinkpad running Windows  XP, where I was finally able to upload the included software.  The instructions date to 2001, reflecting that this product is antiquated.  That said, I did get the cam to work to take a look at the creosote build-up in my chimney.  It functioned OK and did the job.  Price is right for what you get.

Reviews.Title: DOA
Reviews.Author: Alex Daniels
Reviews.Content: Here's another one that never worked on arrival.  I could forgive the questionable construction, rough software, questionable waterproofing, large size and poor video if it was cheap and worked, but alas the only video it outputted was a blank picture.  I tested on several pc's just to make sure it wasn't a compatibility issue, but it clearly wasn't.  Time to invoke Amazon returns.

Reviews.Title: This thing is great
Reviews.Author: Midwest Hacker "Dan"
Reviews.Content: I had one similar to this but lost it in my recent move across country.  This one actually has a brightness control right on the USB adaptor. I really like this unit.  I highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Great little gadget to locate lost Barbie Dolls in sewer drains.
Reviews.Author: Fritz The Cat
Reviews.Content: Works great for my intended purposes. Great price too. You'll need to strap it to a snake or tape if you want to send it down a pipe because it had not stiffness to it at all. It would be like trying to push a wet noodle otherwise. But this is no problem at all as far as I'm concerned. Thanks to whoever dreamed up this gizmo.

Reviews.Title: CD did not have software mentioned in the manual
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Manual mentions software to use with your computer.  That software program was  missing.  Some other program was present and it did not work.  I used windows movie player instead, successfully.

Reviews.Title: Nice unit!
Reviews.Author: Marty80412 "Marty80412"
Reviews.Content: Came quick.  Plugged and played on my XPERIA laptop.  Worked great.  You can record the whole session.  Very cool.  Great price.

Reviews.Title: Very satified with this product.
Reviews.Author: Hien Le
Reviews.Content: It is an exceptional tool to use by do-it-yourself people like me to fix things in the house, particularly for those jobs that requires opening up the dry wall to get the repair done.  This will allow you to validate your speculated problem before starting the needed demolition.  You should try all provided supporting software programs to see which one will fit your needs, e.g., the program that allows you to record the video clipping of the inspection.

Reviews.Title: A low-price USB borescope that doesn't perform too well.
Reviews.Author: Andy Pants
Reviews.Content: This borescope was okay, and I really wasn't expecting stellar performance out of it considering that it's pretty low in price. Unfortunately, it didn't really fit my needs, and I had bought it to look into walls behind drywall for home improvement projects. Since everyone likes bulletpoints:Like!- Waterproof housing means you can use it for adventurous scoping, like for leaky pipes or drain problems.- Long cable, can let you drop and dangle this baby pretty far down the aforementioned pipe or drain.- Plug-and-play capability, didn't require any drivers with Windows 7, and should work with many webcam softwares. I used this camera with Yawcam (Google it!), and it worked fine.Dislike!- LED illumination lights are situated next to the camera, right below the protective plastic lens at the end. When turned to full brightness, the camera effectively blinds itself with the reflection of its own LEDs off of the plastic lens. Expect to have to use the onboard LED illumination at dim settings or use external illumination, which makes having onboard LEDs a bit useless.- Long cord is long and flexible, and makes it pretty difficult to orient or point the camera where you want it to. I was aware of this before purchasing it, but it ended up being a bigger issue than I had anticipated. Basically, if you need to point the camera sideways or upwards, you'll have to come up with some creative ways to do so.- Camera image quality is not very good. Again, I was expecting it at this price point, but the camera feed is quite blurry and grainy. It's workable, but expect much worse image quality than a front-facing camera on some smartphones.I ended up returning this borescope, and purchasing the much more expensive Supereyes borescope: Supereyes Waterproof Borescope Endoscope Inspection The cable isn't nearly as long, but cable will hold the position you flex it to. The camera head is smaller which lets it fit into smaller spaces, the camera image quality is better, and the camera won't blind itself with its own onboard LED illumination. It was also five times more expensive when I'd gotten it, but it worked much better for my needs.

Reviews.Title: It's Okay but,...
Reviews.Author: Firefox
Reviews.Content: A little blurry & there is no real software to record or take pictures (you can using Windows own webcam application). Plastic lens cover will chafe, get scratched up over time; too bad, I like the concept, it's implementation however,...

Reviews.Title: Not Really Sure What Application It'd Be Good For
Reviews.Author: Ambrose "Software Designer & Armchair Philoso...
Reviews.Content: Can't see squat with the light provided. I had to aim a flashlight in behind it. Was going between two floors.The cord is just a cord, so you have to bind it to something if you want to feed it in a wall/floor. Also, it is quite wide, so I had to make a bigger hole than I wanted.It does work, and for the money, it's not a bad deal.

Reviews.Title: Never worked
Reviews.Author: Gerald L Spears
Reviews.Content: Never could get the camera to work. Tried 3 different systems and only 1 desktop would even recognise it.I do not recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: great product
Reviews.Author: Gunsmith
Reviews.Content: this thing works great, the image is clear and large, the lights work great, the software they provide is easy to use and works great, only thing to pay attention to is that the cable has no rigidity so if you have to push it through something you will need to attach it to something rigid

Reviews.Title: Decent, Cheap, Does the job, but hard to control
Reviews.Author: jordyinco
Reviews.Content: Good cheap camera.  Hard to control when putting into a small space, even when using a wire.  Clear plastic on the end gets dirty easily.  Light is bright, but can't see beyond maybe 12 inches.  Good cheap camera though.

Reviews.Title: Does what it says but not worth buying.
Reviews.Author: Texas Popo
Reviews.Content: Like most of the other reviews, camera works. Held it to the floor and slowly moved it up while attached to my laptop. Focus seems to be a few inches. Increasing brightness of the light causes aura around lens. Cable not stiff enough to push through pipes. I hooked it to a hand held drain snake. Pushed it into the water about 2 feet down the pipe (I was looking at the bubbles and realized that it was now in water). Was kinda neat to watch, but not able to really push it all the way I needed to in order to see the problem. My mini-CD had the program file on it and it did run. While the program is running, you get about 25% or more of missed frames. Maybe we need to use an Intel I7 processor with fast memory and SSD drive to avoid any delays. Have not tried it in a wall yet, not really sure what a 2-3 inch focus will show me. it would be nice if it were focused for about a foot.Although it does what it says it will do, it will be almost useless to use to figure anything out. Maybe it was designed to push into an ants nest to watch them run around.

Reviews.Title: Not bad
Reviews.Author: David
Reviews.Content: I ordered two of these.  The files on the CD were bad on the first one, so I opened the next one and they were fine.  (I needed the files for use with Win 8).  It would be nice if they put the driver files on the web.  I made a copy of the driver files so the one intended as a gift will still be a gift.The range of focus on these (as is typical with borescopes) is about 0.25" to 3".  At this range, the image is very sharp.At close range it can be difficult to know what you are looking at.  For example, I put it inside a terrycloth towel and the image of the nap on the towel was so large, it did not look like a towel (but it was in focus).

Reviews.Title: Great quality and price!
Reviews.Author: Thomas J. Thomson
Reviews.Content: Where was this tool when I started out in the skilled trades? Good quality, it really is waterproof. Good light, high visibility. Works very well for its intended purpose.

Reviews.Title: This is a tool that after you get it in your hands you will never let go of it. You can use it that much.
Reviews.Author: Drew
Reviews.Content: Flat out this is a cheep and indispensable tool for anyone that needs to fix anything in a home or car. Trust me on this one. This one is great for small house hold jobs or working on your auto like me. But it has helped me fix a water heater leak a hidden oil leak on my car. A blockage in the clothing dryer. I will buy one that is 50 ft long just to make sure I can cover everything around the house and the pipes hooked to it. It is shocking just how clear you can see with this little thing. Well it is your call. The program that comes with it is easy to use but you are not told much about it and how it works you have to play with it some.

Reviews.Title: The right tool for the job.
Reviews.Author: Albert Estacio
Reviews.Content: I needed something inexpensive to find something trapped behind a wall and this item was just what I needed.  The light is adequate up to about 2-3 inches and the picture quality was much better than I expected.  I plugged this item right into my Windows 7 laptop and it was recognized right away (generic usb cam drivers).  I Google'd around for free webcam software and the one I found (forget the name, but if you really want to know, leave me a comment and I'll look it up) was more than adequate for its use.I can't really comment about the contents of the included disk because I didn't even use it.  Like I said, all I did was plug it into my laptop and I was up and running.

Reviews.Title: Insp. Camera
Reviews.Author: salt94
Reviews.Content: Bought it as a toy to just fiddle around with but it is much more than a toy. Well built and lit. I can see using it to look in small places I would not be able to otherwise.

Reviews.Title: All needed features, simple to use, works as advertised
Reviews.Author: Peter
Reviews.Content: This is one of those things that, once in awhile, you really want to have.  This one is exactly what I was looking for, with the right features, extremely simple operation, and everything works as advertised.  The length is long enough to do most of the things you might want to do with your car or around the house.  Much longer and you would probably need a more rigid cable to be able to coax it out to full length, which might be a problem with shorter, tighter areas.  The adjustable focus is great, and the adjustable light is perfect.  The included software was trivial to use, but the camera works fine with other software too.I did not try the waterproof feature yet.

Reviews.Title: Don't bother
Reviews.Author: John Grimm
Reviews.Content: No good for HVAC ducts.  Focal length is farther than what the LEDs can illuminate without glare.  You can make out things only if you know beforehand what is there.

Reviews.Title: chris young sr.
Reviews.Author: chris young sr.
Reviews.Content: it made a timely job take only minutes, saw what I was looking for and was able to go straight to the problem thanks

Reviews.Title: Great product reasonable price
Reviews.Author: ex-dutchman "ex-dutchman"
Reviews.Content: Great product for a very reasonable price, using a laptop, I can get a full screen image of the pipes under the slab and figure out where to drill to move the toilet to another spot (wife's request). Only make sure you unroll and straighten out the cable before use, if not the camera will twist and you loose the perception of up/down and left/right

Reviews.Title: Fine so far
Reviews.Author: Lawrence D. Buxton
Reviews.Content: All done so far is a quick test.  We'll see how it performs after I perform the task for which I bought it.

Reviews.Title: Good for the money
Reviews.Author: Nick F
Reviews.Content: This is obviously a very cheap item, I only paid around $20 or so as it was on sale, it is much better than what I was expecting for the money, but does leave a lot to be desired, It is hard to contort as its about as rigid as an extension cord so there is no way to aim it, but all that being said I would recommend if your looking for something not expensive to see in tight places.

Reviews.Title: Works fine
Reviews.Author: Cheryl Currid
Reviews.Content: Just about right for looking at things close up with its long cable and variable light settings. Easy to setup and use.

Reviews.Title: Did the Job
Reviews.Author: J. A. Torres
Reviews.Content: The product worked like it was supposed too when I was able to find software to work for it. Right next to the USB there is a dial for adjusting the brightness. The software cd was useless. It was a blank cd. I ended up using another program that had the ability to capture video off a webcam. The only other thing I wished was different was I wish the cable had a little more rigidity to it. But I figure I can always tape a thick piece of copper wiring to it or a metal hanger.

Reviews.Title: Works as advertised
Reviews.Author: DSC
Reviews.Content: For the money, this camera is definitely worth it.  Saved me big money finding a lost ring that fell under enclosed cabinet.

Reviews.Title: Works fine
Reviews.Author: Gerardo Maria Ruiz Torres
Reviews.Content: I bought it because I needed to explore inside a pipe installed in a wall (it was blocked) and it worked just fine. It is actually waterproof, did not break o fail.The software is VERY easy to use and install, and you can actually save your videos or take still frames.

Reviews.Title: Husband B-day Present
Reviews.Author: LTaliaferro "LPT"
Reviews.Content: For a guy who has it all  and loves gadgets, this was perfect! It was very easy to operate... plug and use.  The image on the computre screen was really sharp and my husband could not stop playing with it.

Reviews.Title: Pros and cons
Reviews.Author: andrew "PFC Brian"
Reviews.Content: The camera is good for the price.  The usb connection is a little on the cheap side and didnt seem like it would last long.....but a little electrical tape and you will be fine.  The led light is bright but when you have it at full lighting it blurs the camera due to the location of the LEDs but with medium light it works great.  Picture quality is good for the price.  You wouldnt be able to feed this camera threw a pipe with out a guide.  Wire tape (fish Tape) works good for that.  Over all good product.  Four stars just cause the usb being so cheap.

Reviews.Title: Not for medical use
Reviews.Author: Dr. Bill
Reviews.Content: So I got your attention...this is a great little product...I would not recommend use underwater...but will work in damp environments...so to inspect sewer piper (yuch) is great...but stop when you get to the septic tank...I used it to inspect the ground under some concrete in my driveway...the apron was sinking...saved bucks by doing this myself...you can use and pay for itself the first time...then you can put back on Amazon or eBay and make some dollars...

Reviews.Title: Works fine
Reviews.Author: Ernie
Reviews.Content: The body is a little long which makes it hard to maneuver around corners. Other than that it worked fine..

Reviews.Title: worthless
Reviews.Author: Alan E Kesler
Reviews.Content: In any dark environ, which is the only circumstance that that bore scope should be expected to function in, it is completely worthless. It returns no discernable images principally because the led lights do not illuminate even a confined cavity. Additionally, when turned up, the led's create a distortive glare on the camera head rather than illuminating the area in front of the camera.On the good side, Amazon makes returns and full refund as easy as it can possibly get.

Reviews.Title: Good product - smaller diameter and greater focal range would have been helpful for my applications
Reviews.Author: Dr.C
Reviews.Content: I bought this to inspect a hard-to-reach area of my attic via a hole through the ceiling and to inspect a clog in one of our swimming pool's pipes.  To date, I have only done some brief tests, but the lights and camera work as advertised, and this is a lot less expensive than the dedicated units used by contractors; so I believe it will work as promised.  Here are some points to consider:1. Best focus is a few inches from the lens, although a blurry image of more distant objects is usable2. Unit is > 1 cm across; so it won't fit into very small openings (conduits, water lines, electronic enclosures)3. Cord is very flexible; so it can't be used to push unit unsupported into vertical voids** I'm going to try to wrap a stiff wire around the camera head and use that to support the unit.  I think that may work.Note:  Some reviewers seem to think that you have to use the included software on Windows7, but I found that the Windows Moviemaker application's webcam option will work with it as long as you go into device manager and disable any built-in webcam (e.g. in a laptop).Suggested improvement:  A really nice improvement would be software and a cable that would allow this unit to be used with the USB port on a cell phone.  This would result in a really compact and convenient endoscopic inspection camera for the DIYer.  I don't know Android, IOS or WP8 well enough to say how this could be done, but it should be very useful.

Reviews.Title: easy to use
Reviews.Author: OC_Mango "sunny land"
Reviews.Content: Easy to use, however the color does not look right.  It's a cheap tool for various investigation purposes.  Images are not as good as I hoped.  But a good product with that price...

Reviews.Title: Just what you would expect for the price.
Reviews.Author: Bruce Audretsch
Reviews.Content: A fairly rugged looking cable, fair optics. The image quality I just what you pay for. Adequate for most applications. I haven't yet tested whether it is actually waterproof, but I expect that it will be.

Reviews.Title: this camera does the job
Reviews.Author: Mike
Reviews.Content: This camera works fine the picture is not the best but the 16 foot cable helps if you need to snake it in a pipe or wall it will work for what you need.

Reviews.Title: Not bad for the price.
Reviews.Author: T. Shearer
Reviews.Content: Two shortcomings in my unit: 1. there is a 1 to 1.25 second delay from motion of the camera until corresponding change is seen on the screen; 2. the camera view is offset at about a 15 degree angle to the brass barrel.  Also, I left it running on a XP netbook, and when I came back, the video was frozen, perhaps because the comp went to sleep.I didn't test the water resistance, but I'd tape up the cord entry end before imersing it. The limpness of the cable is not a big deal if you have it taped to a fish tape or guide rod.The LED control on the USB housing worked well for me; helps to spot the unit inside the wall.

Reviews.Title: great quality,
Reviews.Author: Justin A. Schaefer "C/ SCHAEFER"
Reviews.Content: I got it with the intention of using it for my pool's plumbing system, haven't tested the "waterproof-ness" of it yet, but I used it in the rain. it still works

Reviews.Title: Great item---excellent value
Reviews.Author: Brad K "Love a good deal"
Reviews.Content: I bought scope for work.  Individual that uses it says the image and value is super.  Great item, and needs little to no tech knowledge.

Reviews.Title: Good product for the price.
Reviews.Author: Berserker2k4
Reviews.Content: The camera works as expected so far. I have used mainly for drain inspection and it really helped us to understand the problems. I didn't install the software, but the notebook treated it as plug and play and I have been able to view the images by opening the video unit in windows.I didn't have the chance to use it with the snake, but it should just improve. I have tried not to submerge it in water, so I can not confirm if it is submersible.The only small negative part is that the led illumination is not enough when inspecting my air conditioning vents. In long vents is not able to get a clear picture of the whole area, I have to use my camera with flash for that though, so maybe it was too much asking...

Reviews.Title: Th endoscope worked great for me
Reviews.Author: kevin gagliardi
Reviews.Content: This product worked for my problem finding a water leak within an existing wall. I was able to find the leak, make the needed repairs without tearing the wall apart . Saved me time and money. Picture quality was excellent and I couldn't be at the price!

Reviews.Title: great  camera
Reviews.Author: james h sexton
Reviews.Content: worked fine. just had to tape it  to wire for stiffness . worked fine easy adjustment. clear pic ,good lighting.  I would buy again, just a little longer maybe..

Reviews.Title: Works as Expected
Reviews.Author: TCH
Reviews.Content: It focuses from a few inches to several feet.  I plugged it in and ran the executable file on the disk, the picture came up and it worked as I had expected.  The light intensity is variable, which is good, since too much light washes out close up targets.  I bought it to inspect the oil pan of my outboard motor through the exhaust and to take a look at my home's chimney and A/C ducts.  It works for each of these uses.  The cord is pretty flexible so it may require stiffening with a fish tape or coat hanger, depending on the application.  I like it and the price is right.

Reviews.Title: Great item for the price
Reviews.Author: Matthew Jorgensen "Matthew"
Reviews.Content: If you need to look inside a wall, or an engine, then this little light will help you out.Basically it is a webcam on a long cord inside a water proof case.No complaints about it.  Very basic.

Reviews.Title: 16 feet usb great
Reviews.Author: zorro
Reviews.Content: i use it for check inside the engine it work good. it also can be use for swear, anything  even i can spy other room. under the door

Reviews.Title: Good for a reasonable price
Reviews.Author: naoki shoji
Reviews.Content: Very easy to use. Worked with my Mac book without installing the CD. Will recommend to my friends and families

Reviews.Title: Works quite well
Reviews.Author: P. Carbonara
Reviews.Content: Plug and play functionality. I installed this on my macbook pro to use for examining the interior of damaged bicycle frames. It works fine and seems heavy duty enough to tolerate being fed into a tube and twisted around a bit. I plan to treat it fairly gently though because twisting any cable too much aint a great idea.  The picture quality is fine fro my application: seeing things about an inch or two from the lens. The lights are also quite effective.My only complaint is that it comes with a mini cd ... macbook pros don't like these so I had to copy the software onto an old pc and put it on a thumb drive and do that whole hustle.  Not the end of the world.

Reviews.Title: A REAL BARGIN
Reviews.Author: humam
Reviews.Content: I ordered this product when I saw how low the price was.  I really did not expect much.  This product works and works well.  It is not ultra high resolution but it does not claim to be.  You must have a PC/Laptop to use the camera but it is very simple to setup and use.  I use it to check my firearm bores and to inspect mechaniclal parts.

Reviews.Title: It's a good value
Reviews.Author: Jackov O'ltreidz
Reviews.Content: I was worried that it wouldn't work on Mac but as a previous reviewer pointed out all you have to do is open photobooth and change camera to the USB borescope. Video quality is OK. Don't expect to see with a quality you are used to for this kind of experience from movies (I did). LED works fine. Again fine tuning yields fair results. I have to give it 4 stars instead of 3 I had in mind originally because it's a damn good deal.

Reviews.Title: endoscope
Reviews.Author: les wilson
Reviews.Content: opening package almost cut the cd with scissors . works good. used it to look up in attic to find leak

Reviews.Title: Works pretty well
Reviews.Author: vinyl
Reviews.Content: The light on it is good and the camera is really good as well, but in one area we tried it, it didn't work as well as we'd hoped.  However, all the other areas it worked great!

Reviews.Title: Handy for tight spots
Reviews.Author: Alfred Rohling "Gadget Guy"
Reviews.Content: This inspection camera is ideal for plumbing, construction or mechanical applications where you need to see inside something without taking it apart. Great for looking in pipes, between walls, inside an engine compartment or the bilge in a boat. Lighting from the LED lights is good for about 18" to 24" and the wide angle lens allows a close-up view of small compartments. Much cheaper than tearing down a wall.

Reviews.Title: 16 ft USB Endoscope Borescope, waterproof?
Reviews.Author: CDP "Double00Buck"
Reviews.Content: I eaisly made this borescope work with my laptop, connection and using the small CD to provide programming to operate the scope.  It is adjustable with the selectable settings and will brighten or dime the four led lightings.  I have yet to snake it into a pipe or wall to observe how it will function while attached to a "fish tape" to allow me to move it for use.  I will look at insulation behind walls, sewer pipe inspections and just looking where I cannot go with my eyes.  Functions ackwardly.

Reviews.Title: Poorly made, dead on arrival
Reviews.Author: Vlad
Reviews.Content: Plugged into a USB port, no light at all from the four LEDs. Tried to turn a tiny skinny adjustment disc mounted inside the USB connector, feeble flicker at some position. Launched the software supplied on a half size DVD and  pointed the camera to a well lit object, image is fuzzy and software freezes.Overall very poorly made, the camera is off to a side of the tube in which it is mounted. Protected by very thin plastic which is likely to get scratched or crack. Claimed to be waterproof, but the cable is not sealed. Did not bother to check since it does not work anyway.Obviously never tested by any real QA. Shame to sell this product.

Reviews.Title: Cable broke, image not great.
Reviews.Author: Mir "MIR"
Reviews.Content: I use the camera twice. The image is not great, but it would give me an idea. First time I inspected the inside of a 2" pipe.Today I inspected the vent from the bathroom. Immediately after I realized that the cable became loose at the camera end. It had some sort of glue that kept the cable from turning/pulling. The camera doesn't work anymore. I will try to open it and see if I can re-solder the cable, and reseal it.

Reviews.Title: Wouldn't work without CD
Reviews.Author: K. Hirsch
Reviews.Content: First, the customer service from this company was great.  They shipped from China, but it arrived very quickly and they were good about sending the tracking information.  When it arrived, I couldn't get it to work with my Mac Air or PC from work.  I thought something so simple would be plug & play, which was my mistake.  Neither the Mac or PC would detect it at all.  I couldn't install the software because the disc wouldn't work with the Mac Air and I'm not allowed to install software on my work PC.  The vendor was very responsive to my inquiry, but didn't really understand that I couldn't install the software provided and didn't have a download on their site.  I looked around Google for advice, but was unwilling to try downloads from sites that I don't know anything about.  I'll have to find someone that can install it properly and make it a gift.

Reviews.Title: Saved us tons of $$!
Reviews.Author: Snee
Reviews.Content: We recently had plumbing problems in our basement pipes.  We bought this and it worked like a charm!  We located the blockage and had it fixed in no time at all!  Definitely recommend buying this as opposed to paying hundreds for a plumber to do the same thing.  It hooked up to our phones!  Amazing!

Reviews.Title: 16 foot USB endoscope camera
Reviews.Author: James Rockafellow
Reviews.Content: I used this endoscope camera and my laptop computer to identify a blockage in my built-in vacuum system.  The camera has built in lighting and was able to clearly illuminate the blockage and show me how far down the pipe it was.  After determining where the blockage was, I was able to use a hooked wire to snag and remove it.  This camera was a great buy and it worked perfectly.

Reviews.Title: Beats breaking out a floor to see what is wrong!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: We have used it several times to check out plumbing problems. It is also great for looking in a wall while pulling wires. It isn't the sharpest picture, but it is good enough to see what is going on. I love it.

Reviews.Title: Great product!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Joma "Jose M"
Reviews.Content: This product is awsome for the cost. The only drawback is the drivers for windows. If you are a linux user, you won't have a problem but windows is another story. The driver cdRom that they send you is BLANK!  This is the link to the drivers that i found at a seller site. Just google RsCap 1.10 and that should give you a link to 21best.com with link to a zip file. I really can't say anything bad about the camera.

Reviews.Title: Works, but not great
Reviews.Author: Paul
Reviews.Content: I plugged it into my laptop and dropped it into the filler tube to my boats fuel tank. There is supposed to be a light so you can see in dark places. The light doesn't work, or should I say is so dim that I couldn't see anything using it. I would look for something better than this one.

Reviews.Title: This is fun!
Reviews.Author: David C.
Reviews.Content: Well first, of course, I checked out my previously unviewable body parts-mostly disgusting; you should skip that part. Then under the couch, behind the bookcase, under my bed (time to vacuum). Then I remembered why I bought it, to look under the dash to see where my radio antenna goes (for satellite radio). The short focal length was a challenge, but eventually I saw what I needed to see. This thing works! For the price its worth getting as a "big boy toy" and to brag about to your friends. Good price, good quality, good deal.

Reviews.Title: From Tedore Sanikidze
Reviews.Author: tedore
Reviews.Content: Thanks for sending, received in good condition, works well.Use hand I do not know anything, because I sent it to my friend as a gift.

Reviews.Title: Not very high quality
Reviews.Author: Toquer-villan
Reviews.Content: Works OK but focus is a bit off at all distances on the unit I received. It is useable but I expected a bit more quality.

ProductInfo.Features:
5M/16ft WATER PROOF SEWER PIPE DRAIN CLEANER INSPECTION CAMERA
High resolution with 1/6 CMOS camera
4 LED lux luminance lights can work better when the light very dark
Can record video, and save the video in the PC
This portable Digital Microscope must be connected to the computer when using.
ProductInfo.Name: 16ft USB Waterproof Endoscope Borescope Inspection Camera
